response.name: Jane Collins
response.title: DEI Program Lead at Azure
response.bio: Expert in fostering inclusive tech environments through allyship strategies. Author of 'Building Bridges in Tech'.

response.name: Raj Patel
response.title: Inclusion Advocate & Cloud Architect
response.bio: Champions allyship in AI development. Speaks at global conferences on ethical tech practices and diversity.

response.name: Lena Müller
response.title: Diversity Trainer, Azure Germany
response.bio: Specializes in cross-cultural allyship in tech teams. Creator of the 'Inclusive Tech Toolkit' workshop series.
